extension.summary: [COLOR lime]Venom Lite Version[/COLOR] - This is a Moded version of [COLOR red]Venom[/COLOR] and not an official release, No support is offered.
extension.description: This addon does not form part of the Kodi Media Centre. Please do not seek assistance with this addon from any of the Official Kodi Support Channels.
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 3, 29 June 2007
extension.disclaimer: The author is not responsible for the use of this addon. The author is not responsible for the content found using this addon. extension.menu:
[B][COLOR red]Venom[/COLOR][/B] - CM Settings
String.IsEqual(Window(home).Property(context.venom.settings),true) + String.StartsWith(ListItem.path,plugin://plugin.video.venom/) + String.IsEqual(ListItem.Property(isVenom_widget),true)
[B][COLOR red]Venom[/COLOR][/B] - Trakt Manager
String.IsEqual(Window(home).Property(context.venom.traktManager),true) + String.StartsWith(ListItem.path,plugin://plugin.video.venom/) + String.IsEqual(ListItem.Property(isVenom_widget),true) + [String.IsEqual(ListItem.dbtype,episode) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.dbtype,tvshow) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.dbtype,season) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.dbtype,movie)]
[B][COLOR red]Venom[/COLOR][/B] - Clear Providers
String.IsEqual(Window(home).Property(context.venom.clearProviders),true) + String.StartsWith(ListItem.FolderPath,plugin://plugin.video.venom/?action=play) + String.IsEqual(ListItem.Property(isVenom_widget),true) + [String.IsEqual(ListItem.dbtype,episode) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.dbtype,movie)]
[B][COLOR red]Venom[/COLOR][/B] - Rescrape Item
String.IsEqual(Window(home).Property(context.venom.rescrape),true) + String.StartsWith(ListItem.FolderPath,plugin://plugin.video.venom/?action=play) + String.IsEqual(ListItem.Property(isVenom_widget),true) + [String.IsEqual(ListItem.dbtype,episode) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.dbtype,movie)]
[B][COLOR red]Venom[/COLOR][/B] - Auto Play
String.IsEmpty(Window(home).Property(plugin.video.venom.autoPlay)) + String.IsEqual(Window(home).Property(context.venom.autoPlay),true) + String.StartsWith(ListItem.FolderPath,plugin://plugin.video.venom/?action=play) + String.IsEqual(ListItem.Property(isVenom_widget),true) + [String.IsEqual(ListItem.dbtype,episode) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.dbtype,movie)]
[B][COLOR red]Venom[/COLOR][/B] - Source Select
!String.IsEmpty(Window(home).Property(plugin.video.venom.autoPlay)) + String.IsEqual(Window(home).Property(context.venom.sourceSelect),true) + String.StartsWith(ListItem.FolderPath,plugin://plugin.video.venom/?action=play) + String.IsEqual(ListItem.Property(isVenom_widget),true) + [String.IsEqual(ListItem.dbtype,episode) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.dbtype,movie)]
[B][COLOR red]Venom[/COLOR][/B] - Find Similar
String.IsEqual(Window(home).Property(context.venom.findSimilar),true) + String.StartsWith(ListItem.path,plugin://plugin.video.venom/) + String.IsEqual(ListItem.Property(isVenom_widget),true) + [String.IsEqual(ListItem.dbtype,tvshow) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.dbtype,movie)]
[B][COLOR red]Venom[/COLOR][/B] - Browse Series
String.IsEqual(Window(home).Property(context.venom.browseSeries),true) + String.StartsWith(ListItem.path,plugin://plugin.video.venom/) + String.IsEqual(ListItem.Property(isVenom_widget),true) + [String.IsEqual(ListItem.dbtype,episode) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.dbtype,tvshow)]
[B][COLOR red]Venom[/COLOR][/B] - Browse Episodes
String.IsEqual(Window(home).Property(context.venom.browseEpisodes),true) + String.StartsWith(ListItem.path,plugin://plugin.video.venom/) + String.IsEqual(ListItem.Property(isVenom_widget),true) + String.IsEqual(ListItem.dbtype,episode)
-->

extension.summary: Venom - This Addon is currently in beta. Please be aware there may be bugs present
extension.description: Adds Global Contextual Menu Items for Venom menu items throughout Kodi
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 3, 29 June 2007
extension.news: [B][COLOR red]Update - v1.0.2 - April 29, 2020[/COLOR][/B] [COLOR yellow]--[/COLOR][I] Fixed Rescrape option showing on unplayable items.[/I] [COLOR yellow]--[/COLOR][I] Added settings options to turn on and off context menu items.[/I] [COLOR yellow]--[/COLOR][I] Added Auto Play and Source Select context menu options to be inverse of addon play method chosen.[/I] [COLOR yellow]--[/COLOR][I] Some options did not return to homescreen on back, this is now fixed.[/I]

extension.summary: Downloads Artwork for TV shows, Movies and Music videos for addons and stores them in a local SQLITE database
extension.description: Queries, stores, and returns metadata for TV shows, Movies and Musicvideos. [CR]Sources:[CR]www.thetvdb.com[CR]www.themoviedb.org[CR]www.imdb.com[CR]www.omdbapi.com[CR]This product uses the TMDb API but is not endorsed or certified by TMDb.
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 2, June 1991
